title: Media Arts: By the end of  grade 12
subject: Visual and Performing Arts (2020-)

03A8B5580A1843C9A8DE9BBA6A514029.description:
Critically investigate and strategically interact with legal, technological, systemic,
and vocational contexts of media arts.

08BE923F389F4F5B890FC94069EF2C59.description:
Through relevant and impactful media artworks, demonstrate the relationships of
media arts ideas to personal and global contexts, purposes and values.

59AC9472B3A349F6888C22004A41CB5B.description:
Critically investigate and ethically interact with legal, technological, systemic, and
vocational contexts of media arts, considering ethics, media literacy, digital identity, and
artist/audience interactivity

8B9A4FE13F424AFB911295BEED678A0D.description:
Examine and demonstrate in depth the relationships of media arts ideas and works
to various contexts, purposes and values, such as markets, systems, propaganda, truth.

2BC35C40D21D40C285277899B31252F7.description:
Critically evaluate and effectively interact with legal, technological, systemic, and
vocational contexts of media arts, considering ethics, media literacy, social media, virtual worlds, and
digital identity.

D055B281E8FD477A96A660B4832ED8D2.description:
Demonstrate and explain how media artworks and ideas relate to various contexts,
purposes, and values (e.g., social trends, power, equality, personal/cultural identity).

A8B696BF49584FF493D705618D780D7F.description:
Relating artistic ideas and works within societal, cultural and
historical contexts to deepen understanding.

ECCE9E12231348BC954863F1738DF58D.description:
Interpret the use of media artworks in order to demonstrate a high degree of skill to
create new meaning, knowledge, and impactful cultural experiences.

866EB9D08D144C089853702D4F5FA9FB.description:
Independently and proactively access relevant and qualitative resources to inform
the creation of impactful media artworks.

8852BB65770042B6BAE51E03A324B521.description:
Explain and demonstrate the use of media artworks to synthesize new meaning and
knowledge. Reflect and form cultural experiences, such as new connections between themes and
ideas, local and global networks, and personal influence.

C1B1360698104EB09CAF572363E50139.description:
Synthesize internal and external resources to enhance the creation of persuasive
media artworks, such as cultural connections, introspection, research, and exemplary works.

835A42FD960C41A6873BACD026A88D61.description:
Explain and demonstrate the use of media artworks to expand meaning and
knowledge, and create cultural experiences such as learning and sharing through online environments.

E437CB15A027425580ADE66FE9858F8A.description:
Access, evaluate and integrate personal and external resources to inform the
creation of original media artworks, such as experiences, interests and cultural experiences.

1FED79B186224893AFBF76D0CE2F12EA.description:
Synthesizing and relating knowledge and personal experiences to
create products.

AB8531C81F354F99B6CF2661496B106C.description:
Independently develop rigorous evaluations of work, strategically seek feedback for
media artworks and production processes and considering complex goals and factors.

39E23623914347469158223FE9B43E91.description:
Create and apply defensible evaluations in the constructive and systematic critique of
media artworks and production processes.

89773603BE404F95A94A81E667DEA828.description:
Evaluate media art works and production processes at decisive stages, using
identified criteria and considering context and artistic goals

C9F1DFADAF724F2D88417D3338BE930E.description:
Analyze the intent, meanings and impacts of diverse media artworks, considering
complex factors of context and bias.

0FF315B4810D4DFC866A875F92D82747.description:
Analyze the intent, meanings and influence of a variety of media artworks, based on
personal, societal, historical, and cultural contexts.

9E641DB57B064561904A2F0C01F9CB7F.description:
Analyze the intent, meaning and perception of a variety of media artworks, focusing
on personal and cultural contexts and detecting bias, opinion and stereotypes.

9A7C671C9A914EDE8DBB86EEA89AF7BA.description:
Survey an exemplary range of media artworks, analyzing methods for managing
audience experience, creating intention and persuasion through multimodal perception and systemic
communications when addressing global issues including climate change.

78D1660549DB46B781B32FEE00493792.description:
Analyze and synthesize the qualities and relationships of the components and
audience impact in a variety of media artworks.

FE87A8E7D0A8427E9825121AB070568D.description:
Analyze how a broad range of media artworks affect audience experience, as well as
create intention and persuasion through multimodal perception when addressing global issues
including climate change.

C3ADF76A7FB64AA8AD7B6BBFBC3EF70C.description:
Analyze and synthesize the qualities and relationships of the components in a variety
of media artworks and how they impact an audience.

38A50C53978F4A7FBA4D2F3AAF8A71F6.description:
Analyze how a variety of media artworks affect audience experience and create
intention through multimodal perception when addressing global issues including climate change.

AD669E45E3074C65922365C7686E89C6.description:
Analyze the qualities of and relationships between the components, style and
preferences communicated by media artworks and artists.

9F517D6F075C418CBADAC08A4D8EE789.description: Evaluate the benefits and impacts at the global level from presenting media artworks, such as new understandings gained by the artist or audience.

1614FD5DA2984EE884908AE52A9487E2.description:
Curate, design and promote the presentation and distribution of media artworks
through a variety of contexts.

7ECE611AB76541F7AB6B7A188CDCA764.description: Evaluate the benefits and impacts at the personal, local and social level from presenting media artworks, such as benefits to people or to a situation.

0A5F5D595BE84676BC930EA1A0A5B552.description:
Curate and design the presentation and distribution of media artworks through a
variety of contexts, such as mass audiences and physical and virtual channels.

2B256113A1D441B297CD4789CD1DFCCD.description: Evaluate the benefits and impacts at the personal, local and social level from presenting media artworks, such as benefits to self and others.

FA7BDC6B758A45F98C1C0986510E52F4.description:
Design the presentation and distribution of collections of media artworks,
considering combinations of artworks, formats and audiences.

235751ACA33A4A12BFD0111B0B284959.description:
Independently utilize and adapt tools, styles and systems in standard, innovative and
experimental ways in the production of complex media artworks.

68013B1C308D494DAC6D793B002A2F49.description:
Fluently employ mastered creativity and adaptability in formulating inquiry and
solutions to address complex challenges within and through media arts productions.

669937CEC7DB4415B590CFEC5A340C79.description:
Employ mastered artistic, design, technical, and soft skills in managing and
producing media artworks.

2A315F130409481B9B3C063CD101E90F.description:
Demonstrate the skillful adaptation and combination of tools, styles and techniques to
achieve specific expressive goals in the production of a variety of media artworks

77917DD365C54ECA90F344A9C3D7181C.description:
Demonstrate effective creativity and adaptability, such as resisting closure and
responsive use of failure, to address sophisticated challenges within and through media arts
productions.

3123C9D0EBAE4B73860EFE6AB34085B9.description:
Demonstrate effective command of artistic, design, technical and soft skills in
managing and producing media artworks.

D6115D26AA29404CB8B97CC9595DA26F.description:
Demonstrate adaptation and innovation through the combination of tools, techniques
and content to communicate intent in the production of media artworks.

9F0A74E76EE1435D898A50E3A6A3165A.description:
Develop and refine creativity and adaptability, such as design thinking and risk
taking, in addressing identified challenges and constraints within and through media arts productions.

8EC0A7F758244E43B1012C8C254EA92F.description:
Demonstrate progression in artistic, design, technical, and soft skills, as a result of
selecting and fulfilling specified roles in the production of a variety of media artworks.

83B8E2E0D0E44AA0BD1B012420C523D3.description:
Developing and refining techniques and models or steps needed to
create products.

A70028AC3AF34E1493AA68B04A492823.description:
Synthesize various arts, media arts forms and academic content into unified media
arts.

63D48DBE62454525A6D769370561ED20.description:
Integrate various arts, media arts forms and academic content into unified media arts
productions that retain thematic integrity and stylistic continuity, such as transmedia productions.

6B2F6CC677AF4B789D8054DBAA446C14.description:
Integrate various arts, media arts forms and content into unified media arts
productions, considering the reaction and interaction of the audience, such as experiential design.

FFCC9D9D93884601B14DF431DFB09E7C.description:
Intentionally and consistently refine and elaborate elements and components to form
impactful expressions in media artworks, directed at specific purposes, audiences and contexts.

EAB6A48582E346B1A2E70CE00FD9804D.description:
Synthesize ideas with content, processes and components to express compelling
purpose, demonstrating mastery of media arts principles such as hybridization.

186BFF0A1688423291BEC9FA2888BC62.description:
Refine and elaborate aesthetic elements and technical components. Intentionally form
impactful expressions in media artworks for specific purposes, intentions, continuity, juxtaposition,
audiences and contexts.

5C74EB8F1F0C45D7A92354C18B2BE76D.description:
Demonstrate an understanding of media art principles through a selection of tools
and production processes.

6EB753B4771A4B59818B45F4996E842C.description:
Apply ideas with deliberate choices in organization, integrating content and stylistic
conventions.

54EF448292334D6F949CBC8EE69FBF65.description:
Refine and modify media artworks, emphasizing aesthetic quality and intentionally
accentuating stylistic elements to reflect an understanding of personal goals and preferences.

8AC6A568A66447C393D738F3D8455FFA.description:
Understand the deliberate choices in organizing and integrating content, stylistic
conventions, and media arts principles such as emphasis and tone.

B241D0AE3B694D63B3193514847FC985.description:
Knowledge of systems, prototypes and production processes with consideration
of complex constraints of goals, time, resources and personal limitations.

AD99E3CC8C214887B6B3211634FB946D.description: Fluently integrate a sophisticated personal aesthetic for media arts productions.

EC470B8BCE8B4BF1A3B3E3A6106C68A9.description: Apply aesthetic criteria in developing and refining media arts artwork.

C01A3A73B8B84A2D979EB4BF0205676E.description:
Critique plans, prototypes, constraint of resources, and production processes
considering purposeful and expressive artistic intention and personal aesthetic.

FC3E0609E4FF46AF8B2CE649B4B8CB22.description: Organize and design artistic ideas for media arts productions.

3261A985478C4E81BC9D39FFDF6E8A9A.description:
Apply aesthetic criteria in developing, refining and proposing media arts
artwork.

80832C5BE6444E8FA744AE575210E8F2.description:
Critique plans, prototypes and production processes considering purposeful and
expressive intent.

5218D84E81B1406B8EB75738004C17C0.description: Organize and design artistic ideas for media arts productions.

2817858E4BE94C96876DFE198B9FB51A.description:
Knowledge of systems, prototypes and production processes with consideration of
complex constraints of goals, time, resources, and personal limitations.

AAED2FDF77F8430F8864EA0F8D87D1C6.description: Fluently integrate a sophisticated personal aesthetic for media arts productions

39541460F3554F3F8EB721AC3E70E152.description:
Fluently integrate generative methods, aesthetic principles and innovative thinking to
form original ideas and solutions.

B01172495B924D45806B0324BA6E38D1.description: Apply aesthetic criteria in developing and refining media arts artwork.

30FC6EE854814023B3F0C9268FCA1879.description:
Critique plans, prototypes, constraint of resources, and production processes
considering purposeful and expressive artistic intention and personal aesthetic.

EBB674D3279A45279ECBBF6D1C9FCE81.description: Organize and design artistic ideas for media arts productions.

097C80EF1B734422809F28C4B7E024A1.description:
Strategically use generative methods to create multiple ideas and refine artistic goals
that increase aesthetic depth.

C40AB806BE5B4686820DF10883A7C1E3.description: Apply aesthetic criteria in developing, refining and proposing media arts artwork.

6475C331D1674B3BA96B7B9BDB085BB0.description:
Critique plans, prototypes and production processes considering purposeful and
expressive intent.`

F5CC6BB2C34B4C2F9E262B957578FA17.description: Organize and design artistic ideas for media arts productions.

C1AC94824A7F48E2AE169D5FD80BF2CD.description:
Formulate multiple ideas using generative methods to develop artistic goals and
solve problems in media arts creation processes.
